update record set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, event = #{event,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eventDetail = #{eventdetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPoint = #{getpoint,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createStamp = #{createstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from record where uid = #{uid} order by createStamp DESC
